## Color3.scale() method

Multiplies in place each rgb value by scale

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scale(scale: number): Color3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scaling factor |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color3`

the updated Color3
